doc.field: Shr loss 44 cts vs loss 20 cts Net loss 2.4 mln vs loss 880,000 Revs 2.4 mln vs 2.6 mln Year Shr loss 87 cts vs loss 11 cts Net loss 4.3 mln vs loss 494,000 Revs 9.0 mln vs 12.0 mln NOTE:1986 includes restructuring charges of 2.1 mln dlrs and loss of foreign affiliates of 2.0 mln dlrs. 1985 includes loss from foreign affiliates of 173,000 dlrs.
